text: Berberis hayatana is a species of flowering plant in the family Berberidaceae. It was first described in 1952 then renamed in 1954.H.L.Li. 1952. Journal of the Washington Academy of Science 42: 41 Mizushima, Misc. Rep. Res. Inst. Nat. Resources. 35: 31. 1954. It is found mainly in Taiwan.Flora of China Vol. 19 Page 745 南湖小檗 nan hu xiao bo Berberis hayatana Mizushima Berberis hayatana is a low evergreen shrub. It is common to the Central Mountain Range at elevations of between and .Flora of Taiwan Editorial Committee, Flora of Taiwan (Taipei: Epoch Publishing Co., 1975), p. 516 ==References== Category:Plants of Asia Category:Ranunculales
title: Berberis hayatana
